title: Taric's new look… rito
body: Why does the new taric look a lot like Gaston from beauty and the beast. and they are alike as well both like caring about their appearance

replies.body:
I guess that's just who Taric is now.

Can't please everybody :P

Gaston was kinda a dick.
Taric is fabulous.
I think Taric's new look is truly outrageous.
